newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - St. Louis County, Mo..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - St. Louis County, Mo..

text.p: Proposals for the purchase of $16,005,000* principal amount of General Obligation Refunding Bonds, Series 1997, of St. Louis County, Missouri, will be received by the Director of Administration of the County at 41 South Central, 9th Floor, Clayton, Missouri, until 9:30 A.M., Central Time, on

or on such later date as may be established by the Director of Administration and announced via the MUNIFACTS News Service at least 48 hours prior to the time bids are to be submitted, as provided in the Notice of Bond Sale. All proposals will be publicly opened, read and evaluated at said time, date and place. The Bonds will consist of fully registered bonds in book- entry only form. The Depository Trust Company will act as securities depository for the Bonds. The Bonds will be dated as of their date of issuance and delivery, will bear interest payable semiannually on February 1 and August 1 in each year, beginning on February 1, 1998, and will become due in principal installments on February 1 in the years as follows:
Year Amount* Year Amount* Year Amount*

Bonds maturing on February 1, 2008 and thereafter will be subject to redemption and payment prior to maturity on February 1, 2007 and thereafter as described in the Notice of Bond Sale. The Bonds will be awarded to the bidder whose bid will result in the lowest true interest cost to the County. The County reserves the right to waive irregularities and to reject any or all proposals. The Bonds are being issued for the purpose of refunding portions of the County's outstanding General Obligation Bonds, Series 1992. The Bonds and the interest thereon will constitute general obligations of the County, payable from ad valorem taxes which may be levied without limitation as to rate or amount upon all the taxable tangible property, real and personal, within the County. The Bonds will be sold subject to the approving legal opinion of Thompson Coburn, St. Louis, Missouri, Bond Counsel, which opinion will be furnished by the County. A Good Faith Deposit in the form of a certified or cashier's check or a Financial Surety Bond in the amount of $320,000, payable to the order of St. Louis County,

Missouri, is required for each bid to be considered provided in the Notice of Bond Sale. Bidders must refer to the complete Notice of Bond Sale for the terms and conditions of the sale. The County has prepared a Preliminary Official Statement, copies of which may be obtained from the Financial Advisor or the

undersigned. All proposals must be made on forms which may be procured from the Financial Advisor or the undersigned. Additional information regarding the Bonds may be obtained from the Financial Advisor, A.G. Edwards & Sons, Inc., One North Jefferson, St. Louis, Missouri 63103, Attn: Amelia A.J. Bond, (314) 955-2594 or James E. Baker, Director of Administration, 41 South Central, 9th Floor, Clayton,
*Subject to change as provided in the Notice of Bond Sale.
